INSERT INTO TBL_REPLY(REPLY_ID, CONTENT, BOARD_ID, USER_ID) VALUES (#{replyId}, #{content}, #{boardId}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT R.REPLY_ID, CONTENT, R.BOARD_ID, R.USER_ID, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, LOGIN_ID FROM TBL_REPLY R JOIN TBL_USER U ON R.BOARD_ID = #{boardId} AND R.USER_ID = U.USER_ID ORDER BY R.REPLY_ID DESC

SELECT REPLY_ID, CONTENT, BOARD_ID, USER_ID, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, LOGIN_ID FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, REPLY_ID, CONTENT, BOARD_ID, USER_ID, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, LOGIN_ID FROM ( SELECT R.REPLY_ID, CONTENT, R.BOARD_ID, R.USER_ID, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, LOGIN_ID FROM TBL_REPLY R JOIN TBL_USER U ON R.BOARD_ID = #{boardId} AND R.USER_ID = U.USER_ID ORDER BY R.REPLY_ID DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{criteria.page} * #{criteria.amount} + 1 ) WHERE RNUM > (#{criteria.page} - 1) * #{criteria.amount}
